course_title: Special Topics: Political Science: Politics of Protest
seats: Seats: Maximum Enrollment: 7 / Seats Avail: 0Waitlist Total: 0
class_notes:
(Same as AAS 385 12)
This course is designed to analyze topics of political protest, resistance and activism on the national, state, and local levels. By reviewing movement action led by Black people, students will recognize the nature of protest, development of social movements, and political responsiveness to contention.
course_description: Selected topics and problems in political science. Content will vary in successive offerings of this course. May be repeated for credit when topic varies.
